interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE Review Date: 2020/08/12 Store: PURELEOR Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'PURELEOR', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '750810450143'} Review Text: So while most magnetic eyeliners requires 2-3 min to dry, this one takes 20 to 30 seconds!

Such a nice kit, 5 pairs of different sizes and thickness lashes, very good quality.
This kit is worth the price and benefits of it! Review Title: I’m excited with this kit! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
ASP Form-A-Nail, 24 Reusable Forms ASP ['Asp Forman ail is a quick and easy way to create a set of acrylic nails. 24 reusable forms. Easy to follow step by step directions.'] {'Size': '24 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ASP', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.3 x 4 x 3.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '12443563806', 'UPC': '012443563806', 'Manufacturer': 'STAR NAIL-ASP'} I just got this product at a beauty supply!

I love it!!! First time trying and it turned out awesome!!!!

I'm no a nail technician, or any sort of professional but it worked great, I did short, next time I'll do longer, after creating the nail I designed with some crystals!

So much cheaper, and I can do whatever I like going to a nail salon again!! I wish I knew this trick before! JDO Eyelash Curler and 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Value Set-Lash Curler with Refill Pads for No Pinching or Pulling, Mascara Natural Thickening- Long Lasting Waterproof & Smudge-Proof JDO {'Package Dimensions': '6 x 4 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} I was not very impressed.. it acts just like a regular cheap mascara, nothing impressive about it. Didn’t notice much difference than regular mascaras BFWood BFWood {'Brand': 'BFWood', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'All, Dry, Curly, Thick', 'Material': 'Nylon', 'Package Dimensions': '9.92 x 9.45 x 1.85 inches; 5.08 Ounces'} It’s a good brush, firm and sturdy but it does hurt the scalp a little bit, it’s good for brushing but it can hurt! It’s not very flexible. Firm brush 3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE PURELEOR {'Brand': 'PURELEOR', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '750810450143'} So while most magnetic eyeliners requires 2-3 min to dry, this one takes 20 to 30 seconds!

Such a nice kit, 5 pairs of different sizes and thickness lashes, very good quality.
This kit is worth the price and benefits of it! I’m excited with this kit!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Beauty Enthusiast**: The user maintains a strong interest in DIY beauty solutions, particularly focusing on nail care and enhancement, while continuing to explore eye makeup products. 
- **Critical Review of Products**: The user's recent purchasing behavior reveals a more discerning attitude, with an emphasis on comfort and effectiveness when selecting products. This indicates an increasing expectation for performance alongside aesthetics.
- **Cost-Conscious**: The user values affordability in beauty purchases, actively seeking budget-friendly options but now also aligning price with product quality and performance expectations.
- **Creative Expression**: Enjoys customizing nails with embellishments and showcases creativity in beauty endeavors. The desire for reliable products that allow for artistic expression remains a key focus.
- **Novice to Moderate Skill Level**: The user is eager to learn and improve techniques, with a newfound skepticism towards certain products regarding effectiveness and comfort, influencing their choices.
- **Desire for Convenience and Performance**: Appreciates easy-to-use products that come with clear instructions but now prioritizes performance, seeking reliable solutions that enhance the user experience. The recent interaction reflected satisfaction with a product that offered quick results and quality, reinforcing a balance of convenience and performance.

Overall, this user is a creative, cost-conscious beauty enthusiast becoming more selective about product quality, especially in relation to comfort and effectiveness, while continuing to enjoy exploring DIY approaches.
